ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( CPQ_Opportunity__c = FALSE, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Purchase"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Trial"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Decision"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Incubate")),
NOT(OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ($Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin") )),
OR( CM2_License_Count__c>0, CM1_License_Count__c>0),
VG_unit_count__c >0, VG_License_Count__c=0, Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is a camera only deal, check the camera only box (on the opportunity). If not, make sure all hardware units have a matching license attached.
